TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit VisualStyleElement/ListView/Item extends System.Object
public: ref class VisualStyleElement::ListView::Item abstract sealed

Docs.summary: Provides objects for each state of an item of the list view control. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Each property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ListView.Item> class returns a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> for a different state of a list view item.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ListView.Item.Normal%2A> property. To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form. Handle the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementListViewItem1` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
:::code language="csharp" source="~/snippets/csharp/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles/VisualStyleElement+Button+CheckBox/Overview/Form1.cs" id="Snippet177"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples/VB/Form1.vb" id="Snippet177":::
